article_title: The Doc Fix Is Small Change Compared To What Will Be Needed To Fix Obamacare

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: Just about everybody knows there is a problem with the way Medicare pays doctors. But unless you are a doctor, I’ll bet you have no idea what the exact problem is or what Congress intends to do about it. Here is why you should care. The so called “doc fix” [...]
